name: Chicken Cobb Salad With Homemade Ranch Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: boneless, skinless chicken breast, salt, black pepper, large head romaine lettuce, red onion, cherry tomato, avocado, egg, bacon, greek yogurt, milk, white vinegar, fresh parsley, fresh dill, onion powder, garlic powder, black pepper, salt
recipeIngredient: 3 eggs, hard boiled, peeled, and diced
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium bowl, combined the Greek yogurt, milk, vinegar, parsley, dill, onion powder, garlic powder, black pepper, and salt and mix until smooth. Set aside.
Place the chicken on a greased roasting tray and season both sides with salt and pepper.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
Let the chicken rest for 5 minutes before dicing.
In a large serving bowl, combine the romaine lettuce, red onion, cherry tomatoes, diced chicken, avocado, eggs, and bacon.  Pour desired amount of ranch dressing over the salad and toss.
Portion the salad among serving bowls and top with more dressing, if desired.
